review: The item does not work with BBC I player so if like me you are thinking of purchasing it for this purpose forget it.  Works with other TV though.
author: P. Huntington

review: works great can see all net flex movies no cable so this is good to have
author: Maxine

review: Great product. Does exactly what it says. Great for streaming from laptop and easy to use with mobile devices.
author: Michael

review: Best streaming device I've tried by far. Own 3. Highly recommend
author: D. Scott "dasny97"
